short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add borders to all of the page's elements with a custom colour

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will add borders to all of the page's elements. When the page loads you can enter a border colour of your choice. This is useful for front-end developers who want to view all of the bounding boxes of a page.
